nodes.text: If what you uninformed religious bigots and hatemongers believe wasn't so pathetic, it would be funny. What's a guy aspoda do! :xbanghead

emoticon_rolleyes You toss out a false assessment as to what you THINK we 'believe', and ignore the very real reasons why we have explained that this legislation should fail. And in the course of Archie's reply, he makes a statement so Freudian it's kinda funny. Yup! It's an Archie reply... You ask 'What's a guy aspoda do' For starters, you could address WHAT WE SAID on the topic instead of tossing out lame allegations. You evidently think it's okay for the LEGISLATURE to politicize education certification according to their pet PERSONAL theories. You could start by explaining WHY you think this is valid.

I am surrounded by pseudo intellectual elitists who are so steeped in ignorance that they sanctimoniously claim that the full extent of the christians/creationists education starts and stops with the phrase 'God did it'. If what you uninformed religious bigots and hatemongers believe wasn't so pathetic, it would be funny. What's a guy aspoda do! :xbanghead
So tell us irreligious types what religious bigots and hatemongers really believe, since you obviously know better than we atheists, looking in at it from the outside as we do.....
Sounds right to me. What's the problem? emoticon_xangel
So you don't have a problem with turning real graduate degrees into degrees on par with diploma mills?
